DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study define immune response induce HIV vaccine , AIDSVAX B/E . Blood mucosal sample collect assess immune response .
DOC.brief_title: Study Immune Responses Induced HIV Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: The primary purpose study define HIV-uninfected volunteer innate , cell-mediated humoral response induce AIDSVAX B/E systemic mucosal compartment characterize B cell functional specificity peripheral blood , bone marrow sigmoid compartment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female volunteer age 20 40 , available follow Bangkok period 18 month Thai identification card . 2 . Must low risk HIV infection per investigator assessment . 3 . Can read write Thai language must able understand complete informed consent process . 4 . Must successfully complete Test Understanding ( TOU ) prior enrollment . 5 . Must good general health without clinically significant medical history . 6 . HIVuninfected per diagnostic algorithm within 45 day enrollment . 7 . Laboratory screen analysis ( within normal institutional range ) : Hemoglobin : Women > /= 12.0 g/dL , Men > /= 12.5 g/dL White cell count : 4,000 11,000 cells/mm^3 Platelets : 150,000 450,000/mm^3 ALT AST < /= 1.25 institutional upper limit reference range Creatinine : < /= 1.25 institutional upper limit reference range Urinalysis ( dipstick ) blood protein great 1+ , glucose negative 8 . FemaleSpecific Criteria : Negative human choriogonadotropin ( Î²HCG ) urine pregnancy test woman screen prior vaccination ( day ) , prior invasive procedure . Use adequate birth control method follow 45 day prior first vaccine/placebo vaccination continue follow least 3 month final vaccine/placebo vaccination . Adequate birth control define follow : Contraceptive medication deliver orally , intramuscularly , vaginally , implant underneath skin , surgical method ( hysterectomy bilateral tubal ligation ) , condom , diaphragm , intrauterine device ( IUD ) , abstinence . 1 . Active , untreated syphilis 2 . Asplenia : condition result absence functional spleen 3 . Bleeding disorder diagnose medical doctor ( e.g. , factor deficiency , coagulopathy , platelet disorder require special precaution ) , therapeutic anticoagulation result abnormal prothrombin ( PT ) / international normalized ration ( INR ) partial prothrombin time ( PTT ) 4 . Women breastfeed pregnant ( positive pregnancy test ) planning become pregnant window study enrollment 3 month last vaccination visit . 5 . Male female exchange money good sex last 12 month . 6 . An intravenous drug user last 12 month . 7 . History anaphylaxis serious adverse reaction vaccine time past , allergy reaction likely exacerbate component vaccine placebo , include streptomycin neomycin . 8 . Subject receive following substance : Chronic use therapy may modify immune response , IV immune globulin systemic corticosteroid ( dos > /= 20 mg/day prednisone equivalent period exceed 10 day ) . The following exception permit exclude study participation : use corticosteroid nasal spray rhinitis , topical corticosteroid acute uncomplicated dermatitis ; short course ( duration 10 day less , single injection ) corticosteroid nonchronic condition ( base investigator clinical judgment ) least 2 week prior enrollment study . 9 . Blood product within 120 day prior HIV screen . 10 . Immunoglobulins within 30 day prior HIV screen . 11 . Any licensed vaccine within 14 day prior initial study vaccine administration present study . 12 . Receipt investigational HIV vaccine . 13 . Investigational research agent vaccine within 30 day prior initial study vaccine administration present study . 14 . Use antituberculosis prophylaxis therapy past 90 day . 15 . Any medical , psychiatric , social condition , occupational reason , responsibility , judgment investigator , contraindication protocol compliance impairs subject ability give inform consent . 16 . Psychiatric condition precludes compliance protocol ; past present psychosis ; past present bipolar disorder ; disorder require lithium ; within 5 year prior enrollment , history suicide ideation attempt . 17 . Study site employee involve protocol and/or may direct access study related area .
